Text: i downloaded this a few days ago and the next day got an email from comcast saying it was tracked. just a slap on the wrist, but beware.
I got a copyright infringement level 1 letter from Verizon after downloading this.
If i have any problems im reporting Konashine
If i have any problems im reporting Konashine.
i got chicken after downloading this. And chips.

if your ISP is threatening you tell them to eat shit! and find another ISP!! You pay them for service, correct? so comcast and verizon are assholes .. don't give them ANY future business. KEEP THE NET FREE!!!!

If your IP is being tracked then get Peerblock.

It stops all sorts of people from tracking your IP.

:)

also got a letter from Verizon.  ive grabbed a ton off here and the 'Noid and never a letter till this.  fwiw it's nothing to do w/ the uploader i don't think, the studios just pick random torrents (usuallly of popular releases) and track them.
This and season 2 by Konashine are great quality. Audio is nice and loud. Video is crispy clear. 10/10
